name: 黃銘智
objective: 本課程旨在介紹研究快速原型之原理與方法，並藉設計實例演練，以達熟悉研究快速原型之操作與功能。
schedule:
1. Introduction to RP & Application
2. 3D CAD Basic
3. 3D CAD Basic
4. 3D CAD Basic
5. 3D CAD Basic
6. 3D CAD Basic
7. Product Design and Prototype
8. Process of Rapid Prototyping
9. The Format of STL
10. CAD Data Exchange
11. Practice of rapid prototyping
12. Practice of rapid prototyping
13. Practice of rapid prototyping
14. Practice of rapid prototyping
15. Classification of RP systems
16. Extending Technology
17. Micro RP
18.  Final Report
scorePolicy:
專題製作：80％
平時考評：20％
